name: Vector Shield
description:
An horizontal-scrolling shooter game about spaceships, Squids and the deadliest weapon of all...the Vector Shield!.

Charge the vector Beam defending yourself with the Vector Shield and resist the enemies waves shooting your way out of this mess.

This game is the result of an internal game Jam of Dash Team Games w test workflows. 

NOTE: After the 10th weave you will encouter the Boss!

----------------------------

DASH TEAM GAMES:

PROGRAMMING AND GAME DESIGN: Mauricio Partnoy

VFX y UI  :Jonatan Olavarria

MUSIC AND FX: Iñaki Roque

PIXELART: Joaquín Martínez
